column4: On my fresh install, after reboot, the system just sits at a blank screen with a flashing cursor.  No grub menu ever shows up, but grub-install /dev/sda (booted into a livecd to do it) works fine.
No errors.
there you find a way, you can boot live cd ? want a walkthrough on re-installing grub ?
I can boot a live cd. I've reinstalled grub... three times.
you used mount bind, chroot and also tried a recheck ?
